title: My Resume
description: Explore my journey, skills, and experiences through an intuitive and elegant User Interface featuring an 8-style theme switcher
paragraphs: Crafted using the basic trio of HTML, CSS and JS, with the wonderful Tailwind
For this project, I wanted to implement the glassmorphism design, combining with a theme-switching capability to suit your preferences

title: Sport Food
description: Discover Sport Food - my React and Firebase project. A restaurant app for healthy meals, easy orders, and administration dish management
paragraphs: I developed a dynamic REACT and FIREBASE application for Sport Food, a health-focused restaurant
Users can easily explore and order from a menu of nutritious options while tracking their order history
The admin section provides an interface for creating, editing, and deleting dishes

title: Hikes Blog
description: Dive into my ongoing Angular project â€“ a front-end application designed to capture the beauty of hiking landscapes
paragraphs: Currently in development, my Angular-based project revolves around my passion for hiking
This front-end application serves as a visual narrative, allowing me to share the breathtaking landscapes I encounter through a beautiful designed blog
Stay tuned for an immersive experience that brings the joy of hiking directly to your screen!

title: victoria
description: Explore a single script website showcasing the CV of my partner, a sports business engineer, seamlessly blending simplicity, elegance, and functionality.
paragraphs: This project follows the same language stack as my personal CV, utilizing HTML, CSS, JS, and Tailwind
With a distinctly professional and elegant design, this 'single script website' beautifully highlights the journey of my partner, a sports business engineer, adding finesse and style to her profile

title: Les petits mandarins
description: Introducing a corporate project where I translated a graphic designer's vision into reality
paragraphs: Throughout my journey within the company, I incorporated a stunning landing page, from a beautiful mockup designed by a graphic designer
If you want to collaborate with, you can cantact her on Linkedin Emma Rouquet and view his Portfolio

title: Globe Speaker
description: Presenting another corporate achievement - the landing page redesign integration from a UI/UX designer's mockup
paragraphs: Throughout my journey within the company, I incorporated a stunning landing page, from a beautiful mockup designed by a UX/UI designer

title: Chalkboard
description: A portfolio prototype featuring a chalkboard design
paragraphs: Developed as my first React project, this prototype showcases a chalkboard-inspired aesthetic, serving more as a fictional project than a real portfolio
